thread.title: Appointed: Costa Group Asia President

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: Appointed: Costa Group Asia President
text:
Appointed: Costa Group Asia President   Buhdy Bok, Costa Cruises Asia Pacific   
Michael Thamm, CEO of the Costa Group, announced the promotion of Buhdy Bok, the current President of Costa Asia, Costa Cruises Asia Pacific & China, to Costa Group Asia President, effective in October 2015. The promotion demonstrates Costa Groupâ€™s continued expansion throughout Asia, and strong commitment to the China market in particular. In his new position, Buhdy Bok will be steering AIDA Cruises and Carnival Cruise Line, two cruise brands that will enter the China market in 2017. 
Costa Group owns and operates a fleet of 25 ships worldwide between the two brands of Costa Cruises and AIDA Cruises.
